title: Jack Stone - Deadly Revenge
description: JACK STONE - DEADLY REVENGE, available worldwide July 30th.A missing woman feared dead, and her sister desperate to find her. How can Jack Stone refuse?Called to California Stone discovers the sordid secrets of Heston's Cove and the dangerous man who deals in women, sex and slavery."We called it from the start - this is THE series of the year! The Jack Stone series just gets better and better!" "Vivien Sparx took everything great about Jack Stone in Wild Justice and amplified it a million degrees in Deadly Revenge."- A Book Whores Obsession Blog"To a woman Jack stone exudes raw, intense sensuality, with his ruggedly handsome good looks and alpha male tendencies. But to a man on Jack Stone shit list he reeks of finely honed menace, determination and all kinds of trouble."- Nevena Read, Reviewer
author: Vivien Sparx
